paragraphs.text: Download this zip and unpack it under a directory 'les19'
On the backend side (the Kafka side) this is a websocket server. Kafka streams, can stream also to the web client side.
paragraphs.conclusion: Undertow websocket can be built into every Apache Kafka service (producer,consumer and stream)

paragraphs.text: And on the client side (put in resources/web/index.html) :
See here in index.js (also in resources/web/index.js) that we use WebSocket, built in in every modern browser, no extra dependencies needed!!
paragraphs.conclusion: We will connect kafka topics as chatboxes's to the outside world.
